commands.extension.minify.title: Minify this File
commands.extension.minifyInNewFile.title: Minify and Save as New File
configuration.title: JS & CSS Minifier Tool Configuration
configuration.minifyInNewFile: Save minified content in a new file.
configuration.minifiedNewFilePrefix: Prefix for the minified new file. The extension will be the same as the original file. Only applies when saving minified content in a new file.
configuration.minifiedNewFilePrefix.enum: The new file name will have the '.min' extension.
The new file name will have the '-min' extension.
The new file name will have the '.compressed' extension.
The new file name will have the '-compressed' extension.
The new file name will have the '.minified' extension.
The new file name will have the '-minified' extension.
